title: WHY AM I STUCK HERE
body: I skipped waiting for stats cause it was taking too long but now the game says i crashed and i have to re connect THE GAME IS OVER i cant re connect some one help i have logged off and on and its still their HELP

replies.body:
We're aware of a service incident that happened last night that was causing a number of issues including logging in, starting games and updating IP/LP gains and match history. This was resolved later in the evening, prior to the scheduled maintenance. 

If you're still experiencing this issue, please let me know.
i have played a game today but in my match history my taliyah game is still missing and I have not received my Lp or Ip yet.

At this point, we can confirm the game service didn't properly record the match results. If the match doesn't show up immediately (under normal network conditions), then it won't show up at all. Regrettably, we cannot add the results or LP/IP manually if the match wasn't recorded, so it seems this match is gone for good. :(

Let me know if you have any additional questions.
Honestly i don't know what to say i'm really upset but thiers obviously nothing that can be done so anyways, thanks for trying i guess
Matches can be delayed - I've waited 2 hours for my matches to appear on 2 occasions and they appeared. However there weren't any stability issues then, unlike this case.
It's possible it can be delayed. How long ago did you play the match?
about 18/19 hours ago ( so much math i had to do )
Unfortunately, due to the server stability issues, the servers were unable to record your match thus not granting you any LP/ IP. There is no way of retrieving the match.
